Text: Jan Hammer:  He first gained his most visible audience while playing keyboards with the Mahavishnu Orchestra in the early 1970s, as well as his film scores for television and film including "Miami Vice Theme" and "Crockett's Theme", from the popular 1980s program, "Miami Vice".
Triplets:<Jan Hammer
2:
--------------------
Text: Jan Hammer:  He has continued to work as both a musical performer and producer, expanding to producing film later in his career.
